title: (x) This Tuesday in Texas - Snell Roundhand (customized), Rockwell {Chesh, Jack Carye (self)}
content:
Hello once again folks, here i got another picture to interpret, and need to know if the texas text ia a custom, but is there any base font of it?   
thank u verry much for your time and effort   
jake carye   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111115730im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36475.jpg)
author: jakecarye

comments.content: [Snell Roundhand](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111115730/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/snell-roundhand-script/snell-roundhand-bold-script/testdrive.html?s=Texas&p=48) is pretty close, but not exact...
Chesh, I think that's it, but they messed with the T.
And Jake, as a closet wrestling fan myself, I have got to askï¿½what are you using all these early-mid '90s WWF logos for?

Thanx again Cheshire Dave for the link, and well Metadox, i just love to collect logos and fonts specially wrestling related, im redoing some of them for a personal archive and and some not but this is just a hobbie, probably in the near future i'll post some of my creations; btw i forgot to ask whats the name of "this tuesday" font thanx for the question!   
regards!
Oh! just so nobody missundertand this what im remaking are logos and im collecting the fonts that i have foud some are purchased and others freeware!

OK then just if anybody else is interrested "This Tuesday" actually is Rockwell, i guess the zoom and the quality of the picture does not alloud a clear intrepretation but i found it! ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111115730im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36575.jpg)
